# Contract ID: PW-22-01009180
## Government Tender Announcement Summary

### Contract Overview
A notice of proposed contract award is hereby advertised to the procurement community for the provision of access control system updates at the Cowansville Institution. This announcement is being made in accordance with the Advance Contract Award Notice protocol and in compliance with the terms and conditions outlined within the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

### Contract Overview Details
Contract ID: PW-22-01009180
Contract Description: The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), through CORCAN Construction, requires an update to the access control systems at the Cowansville Institution.
Pre-Identified Supplier: Régulvar Inc., the sole authorized Quebec supplier of Delta Controls.

### Request for Statement of Capabilities (S.O.C.)
Suppliers interested in the contract must submit a statement of capabilities to the designated contact officer, Linda Mandeville, no later than 14:00 hours, October 19, 2022.

### Contract Terms and Conditions
* Work to be done: The successful contractor will be responsible for the update of access control systems in buildings 30 and 31 at the Cowansville Institution.
* Language: French
* Region: Quebec
* Estimated Contract Value: 122,438.46 CAD (includes GST/HST)
* Proposed Contract Date: Two (2) months, from contract award to December 20, 2022

### Requirements and Exclusions
* Training: The successful contractor must have completed all levels of training offered by Delta Controls.
* Experience: The successful contractor must have ten (10) years of experience in Delta control installation.
* Intellectual Property: No intellectual property terms are included in the contract.

### Contact Information
* Contact Officer: Linda Mandeville
* Email: linda.mandeville@csc-scc.gc.ca
* Telephone: 438-357-6503
